mapper.insert: insert into supporters_heart( heart_id, supporters_num, user_id, heart_date ) values ( supporters_heart_seq.nextval, #{supportersNum}, #{userId}, sysdate )
mapper.delete: delete from supporters_heart where user_id = #{userId} and supporters_num = #{supportersNum}
mapper.select: select sprt.num, heart.user_id from supporters_heart heart inner join supporters sprt on sprt.num = heart.supporters_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId}

select sprt.num, sprt.supporters_name, heart.heart_date, heart.user_id from board_heart heart inner join supporters sprt on sprt.num = heart.board_num and heart.USER_ID = #{getUserId} order by sprt.num
